heading: Today
text: Snow showers for the northern mountains. A few passing snow or rain showers in northern valleys. Clouds south.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mountain snow showers, scattered northern valleys, clouds south.

heading: Friday
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Saturday
text: Partly cloudy; chance of late-day rain or mix in the St. Lawrence Valley.
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south
